item.title: Answers for these two big questions‚ùì
item.description: Q1: How one could achieve success? Q2: How one could achieve happiness, what is the meaning of happiness? I asked two questions above to different people and got answers from them. Firstly, I will write their answers, then I will share my perspective, my answers. I’ll hide their names, cause of privacy and confidentiality. These people saw a lot of things in life. Maybe, they are not successful when you consider money or lifestyle, but I believe they have valuable answers.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: I’m starting to write public journals, my learning process and other technical blogs. I spent most of my time with creating this blog site today. I hate web development, somehow I finished with cool tools like Jekyll. üíï Still there are some bugs, one of them is footer links are not opening in another tab. I looked every little hole (even blackhole!) but couldn’t find a solution. It’s night here, I still have unfinished tasks but I’m writing my first blog.
